Name: Wandering Tales Travel Dreams
Title: Nice temple to visit any time of the year including Navratri time!
Review: Very nice temple to visit.  The idol of Peddamma Devi here is quite captivating.  Went there during Navratri time, early evening.  There was a lot of rush, however, the lines moved quickly and smoothly.  Parking is available onsite.  Well maintained considering the number of people that visit, especially during festival time.

Name: Global-Bhatakanti
Title: Local Devi temple in Hyderabad
Review: It's one of the small but famous temple in Hyderabad. Though not frequented by tourists it's popular with locals. There are 3 temples.located in the same compound. Temple closed at 8 pm. Parking charges 10 rs. For 2 wh and 15 for 3 wheeler.

Name: Michael P
Title: Mother of Mothers
Review: This is one of the mst popular temles n Hyderabad. The word "Peddamma", which consists of two separate words Pedda and Amma, literally mean 'Mother of Mothers' or "The Supreme Mother". She is one of the 11 forms of Village Deities and is known as The Supreme most. The main gopuram of the temple is currently being repainted.

Name: Surya Katakam
Title: 150 Years Old Temple
Review: This temple is located in Road No. 55 Jublihils, which is one of the famous Amman Temple in Hyderabad city after Secunderabad Mahankali Temple(Mahankali) This temple is 150 years old and came to popularity in the year 1993 after constructing Raja gopuram. Ex. MLA P Janardhan Reddy(PJR) personally made much improvement to this temple. The trust individuals done huge improvement in most recent couple of years. The other deities in the Peddamma Temple are Laxmi, Ganapathi, Sarasvati, and Naga Devata. Peddamma temple is also dedicated to Santana Laxmi, who sits on a lion. The major festival celebrated at the temple is Bonalu, which comes on Ashsda Masam in the month of June-July every year. On the day of Bonalu, women carry earthen pot decorated with neem leaves with turmeric and Kumkum. Devotees prepare food in the pot with rice, jaggery, milk, and curd. The earthen pots are carried as an offering to the Goddess. Second main festival is Rathotsavam in this temple, which happened for four days on Ratha Saptami Another main festival celebrate here is Mahotsavam. During all these  three festivals hue crowd will be there in this temple. Near By Attractions: 1. KBR National Park 2. Durgam Cheruvu 3. Jagannathan temple 4. Shilparamam Temple Timings:  Morning 06:00 -13:00 and Evening 15:00-20:00 (All days Except Sunday)  Morning 06:00 -20:30 (Sunday)

Name: Mutukuloju Pranay
Title: Temple of Great Hope
Review: Peddama temple is well occupied by the space and much precious for jathara like activities. Dasara festivals are well celebrated. bonalu unique festival in Telangana state is celebrated here too. kindly don't touch the poles while standing in the queue. the are not earthed may get shock

Name: VasantaLeela
Title: Devi's energy is grand and gracious
Review: Good access by public transport, sufficient parking and walking areas, Well organized premises and staff, and beautiful 'alankaaram' of the deity-- made this a heartful and happy  visit

Name: Govind Dev
Title: Famous Temple HYD City
Review: Peddamma temple is one of the famous temple located at jubilee Hills in Hyderabad. Good place to visit for sure

Name: suryaroyl
Title: Devotional
Review: Temple ambiance and the staff keeps the visitors happy, the space of the temple and feel good environment post darshan makes very happy. Instead of buying pooja items at temple for best price you could get it from outside.

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: Famous temple
Review: This is one of the popular and most visited temples in Hyderabad. The entrance tower of gopuram is very impressive. The temple itself is enclosed in typical Dravidian styled quadrangle. The Vimana is also impressive. There are a number of smaller temples within the same temple complex. The temple timings are 7 am to 12 noon and evening 4 to 9 pm. Photography is not allowed inside the temple complex. There is ample parking space

Name: sree143in
Title: famous
Review: A VEry Very famous tempel in Hyderabad for all people, every one must visits once in a life time who goes hyd.

Name: Dutt knvs
Title: Well maintained temple
Review: This temple is being maintained well and all Hindu festivals are being performed. This is a famous temple in Hyderabad, at the heart of the city. People believe that whatever you wish, the godess will give you. In festivals, people visit in to the temple at large. Daily people visit the temple from all over the State.

Name: Srinivas_63
Title: Visit as a Devotee only
Review: Many residents believe this place and goddess as very powerful and come here and give their offerings and perform pooja. The killing of goats and chicken in the name of of sacrifice/offering especially on Sundays is a bit annoying. The darshan arrangements are good but not a peaceful place like many other temples. Suggested only for people who believe in Peddamma Talli (Goddess).

Name: srinath
Title: good place for a devotee
Review: peacefull place with a parking place trust me every temple doesnt have parking lot....bt it does....impressed😊😊

Name: Sundaresh
Title: Pseudo Attulkal Bhagavathy Temple in Hyderabad
Review: The Temple is located  and well connected in Hyderabad.   The temple follows all rituals and all Pujas done satisfactorily. Everyday vedic mantras are read and very soothing to ears and heart.Prasada Puliyorah is offered and  affordable, very tasty and filling. Once a year food as prasad is offered to all devotees and every friday upto 500 devotees are offered lunch as prasad.

Name: Debasis
Title: Temple
Review: Whatever good I have heard about this temple, all became true when I visited this temple.Very nice and we'll maintained.Choose your visit time carefully to avoid rush or crowd.My visit was calm and devotional.

Name: rkirans
Title: Very calm and peaceful place
Review: It's one of those popular temples in Hyderabad and that too in prime area. It has a big car parking lot. Well organized Darshan queues for main deity Peddamma talli. There are other small temples for Naga devatas, Lakshmi mastha, Vigneswara swami and Saraswati maatha. The prasadam served is very good here.

Name: amitthecreator
Title: Peddamma Temple
Review: Peddamma Gudi is a very powerful temple and has a peaceful divine atmosphere attracting many tourists throughout the year. Distance of Peddamma Temple from various places of the city are listed here:Mehdipatnam [8 km]MGBS [13 km]Secunderabad [12 km]HITEC City [5 km]Punjagutta [7 km]

Name: KP Ram
Title: Amma Blessings
Review: Must visit place, have peddamma talli blessings. Near to peddamma temple there is metro station for easy reaching.

Name: Prashanth
Title: very vast temple
Review: People working here as well as priests working here have attitude issues.You can feel it as soon as you ask for any information or while buying the tokens or doing any poojas

Name: Karthik K
Title: Durga Mata Temple
Review: Ladies be sure to wear traditional dress as it was written on the entrance. if possible try to visit in the weekdays to avoid rush.

Name: beyondtravel
Title: Durga temple
Review: A 150 year old historic maari temple with huge premises and lot of devotees known for its customs.  We are lucky to visit during bonulu the flower festival and diety observant of shakambari avatar... Great place to be

Name: Akshay
Title: Nice place
Review: Powerful and famous goddesses temple in Hyderabad. No entry ticket its free darshnam. its around 8-10 KM from Hyderabad station

Name: RajeshKota
Title: Deity saving you all the time
Review: It's a huge temple with colourful art work all around. The Prime Deity - Durga Devi is very kind and merciful. The Pooja rituals are done with utmost respect and dedication. There is ample space for parking. Jai Bhavani!!

Name: jainms
Title: Peddamma Temple - Devotional
Review: Very good place to visit and it is peaceful. Many people travel from long distance to visit this devotional temple locate d in Jubilee hills Hyderabad.

Name: TravelbuggIndia
Title: Peddamma Temple
Review: Peddamma Temple is a great tourist attraction in Hyderabad. Do visit this place for peaceful and calm vibes.

Name: sanaser
Title: Famous Hindu Temple
Review: Peddamma Gudi Temple is a famous Hindu Temple is located at Jubilee Hills in Hyderabad city. My first visit to temple is quite impressive. The temple is dedicated to Goddess Laxmi. After entering inside the temple,there is a place where we observed that devotees place their coins vertically to make a wish and they believe that their wish will be fulfilled if they place the coin vertically. People come from various parts of the state in the festival season of Bonnalu which celebrated in the months of June - July in every year.

Name: crsarma
Title: Awesome temple of Mother Pedamma
Review: My first visit was way back in 1999 when we got our vehicle blessed by her at the temple. The priests are knowledgeable and polite. That was when Madhapur was developing the Hi-Tech way,My many  visits have reinforced the same feeling and added to the peacefulness despite being located in one of the busiest places in Hyderabad. The parking is good and its worth visiting. Avoid Fridays , Full moon days and festival days as there are a lot of devotees.

Name: Nagesh Eco Ventures
Title: Peddamma Temple
Review: Quite a cool and relaxing worship place. Visited here many times during my stay in Hyderabad. Namaskaram

Name: Rakesh
Title: Holy Place and popular temple
Review: the temple is in prime area, you may face traffic during office hours of any weekday or working daytemple has good parking facility.if there is rush dont worry take a darshan ticket of 10 rupees,bad part is they dont have proper facility to give tokens for prasad, you may feel Sun and hot if you go after 10 AM.

Name: pvrkaushik
Title: Popular temple
Review: This place is popular as its in prime jubilee hills and film nagar area.. Ample parking. Not a MUST VISIT kind... But a temple u can cover

Name: gkrishna10
Title: Darshan
Review: Famous temple of Gaddess peddamma. It's loacated near to peddamma temple metro station. We went twice and it's been great experience.

Name: S R V
Title: Holy Trip
Review: Went to this temple on 31st of march 2019. We were five families in all. The temple is a most sought after holy place in Hyderabad and our experience proved this. Heavy crowd being a Sunday but the arrangements were good and we could worship the Goddess within 15 minutes. Wonderful experience.

Name: reubenranjanfern2017
Title: Wow and holy.
Review: It is told to be one of the famous and holy temple in Hyderabad. Nice architecture though.  Nice pace to offer your prayers.

Name: Srinsiri
Title: Positive Vibe
Review: Place has awesome vibe. Super spacious and big parking. This is the lung space in jubilee hills area where you can see some open space

Name: SenapathiAmbika
Title: Temple of Durga Maa for Spiritual people
Review: We happened to visit the Peddamma temple when we came on some official work to Jubilee hills. Jubilee hills more famous by this temple.It was early hours of Friday so, there was less rush.The temple premises is Vast with the main Garbha Gudi and there were Maa Saraswathi, Laxmi and Nagadevtha  temples  also. There is a separate Bhavan for Annadhanam and Prasadam. The dharshan of main Deity sitting on Lion ie. "SIMHAVASINI " is really adorable. I could not take away my eyes from the Maathaas serene feeling touched my heart. We performed puja. A separate arrangement is made for people to perform kumkum archana,abhisheka etc. for fee ranging from 10 to 1000 Rs.         At the entrance of the temple near the mantapa, people place the coins making a wish. If the coin stands still  then it is said the wish will be fulfilled or else No.I could see the Mahima of Maa when I placed the coin and it was standing still. It was totally an exciting and spiritual  visit. A place worth visiting. Time 1 to 2hrs if on Fridays.Photography strictly restricted.

Name: Pooja
Title: Holy Visit
Review: Devotional Place... Forget everything and meet your own self in this temple... Accessible via public transport I had been there quiet a lot of times like every alternate Sunday and felt really revived after each visit

Name: NAZEER SHAIK
Title: very pleasant and devotional
Review: iam really happy by visiting this temple. me and my friend feeling blessed with this place and so happy

Name: Usha65
Title: Most adored religious place
Review: In Hyderabad there are plenty of religious places, but this temple is the most adored worshiping place. Many people believe that a visit to this temple gives lot of peace and prosperity, hence several people are seen visiting this temple. No wonder it is crowded most of the time. During the festival times, the decorations and celebrations are not to be missed.

Name: dwincherran19
Title: powerful temple
Review: very powerful temple must visit place temple in Hyderabad  you will be blessed and this is not a place to visit in hyderabad

Name: Satish Rao
Title: Must to See Place to get the blessings
Review: Peddamma temple is the must see place to get the blessings if you start any new business or would like to do any new job.Jai Peddamma Thalli

Name: nethis
Title: blessed
Review: one will feel blessed visiting peddamma talli. very famous temple in the city, one should visit without miss. festival season will be very crowded and takes an hour for darshan during peak hours. normal days will just take 15 mins.take the blessings of the goddess and you feel happy and peaceful.

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: Visited Twice
Review: This place has got its importance and will make your mind peaceful and can take you to the different world.Best to visit in normal days than festive days.

Name: chandrasekhar g
Title: Devotional place
Review: today visited peddamma temple.crows is more compare to week days.Darshan takes 25-40mins.For prasadam also it will take minimum 35-60mins.

Name: MUKKU S M R S
Title: Hindu Temple
Review: Located in famous Jubilee Hills area , I have visited this place multiple times. Famous religious place for Bonalu festival during season

Name: venkat k
Title: Holy place
Review: Famous in hyderabd. I have visited this place multiple times also i got my new bike puja here. This is located in banjarahilles.

Name: MSR
Title: Jubilee Hills Peddamma Temple, HYB
Review: Located in famous Jubilee Hills area and situated in sprawling area with ample parking place. Late Sri. P.Janardhana Reddy, Ex.MLA was a die-hard devotee of this deity and who played key role in developing this temple. A very famous religious place for Bonalu festival during season and visiting number of times.

Name: Sathish V
Title: Always enjoyed visiting this temple
Review: This temple is located in Banjara hills, with a nice parking and organised facilities. its always serene visiting this temple. Also easy commute available through bus and Metro.

Name: SandeepSaxena-IIP
Title: “The Durga Temple” peddamma Temple
Review: Peddamma Temple , located at Jubilee Hills Hyderabad, is a famous pilgrimage spot for Hindus. The word Pedamma is derived from two words Pedda and Amma, which means Mother of Mothers. She is worshipped all across the region and is among the 11 form of village deities. This temple must be visited during the festival season of Bonaalu,  which occurs during June–July every year. People from across the region visit this temple to offer their prayers to The Mother.  The two mega events namely Mahotsavam and Rathotsavam are also celebrated in February.All days of the week except Sunday6:00 AM - 1:00 PM3:00 PM - 8:00 PMSun6:00 AM - 8:30 PMIt's a good temple with all the devotees you get all the energy and you feel there is something over here which gives you energy.

Name: mighty7886
Title: Temple with good environment
Review: The temple is large enough to handle crowds during festivals and has a peaceful environment with all the required facilities.

Name: SoloMTraveler
Title: The Durga Temple
Review: Located prime place called Jubilee Hills in Hyderabad. A holy temple of goddess "Peddamma" (Durga). Very crowded on weekends.

Name: rockzzM77
Title: The Holy place
Review: This is holly place, nice place to visit with family,  this temple is crowded with the locals, but not so clean.

Name: Travel144090
Title: Nice to see temple that is in daily use by locals
Review: If you want to see the temple that is in daily use by locals this is the place. Crowded, not so clean. You will see some real god worshiping and some ceremonial activities. Interesting place to see.

Name: keshav AGARWAL
Title: Temple visit
Review: Temple is good.I first time visit here.There r soo many gods at a single place.I love the place .Here each temple had a pujari.who takes care of it.And we r not able to click the photos inside.There r soo many lodge near temple or station.Thank you for reading my review.I love travelling.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: Nice temple
Review: It's a good temple with all the devotees you get all the energy and you feel there is something over here which gives you energy.

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: well known temple
Review: Must visit place in hyderabad for good sacried person and will make his mind peaceful and also this place has got its own importance.

Name: Shiva P
Title: No one is capable to rate the Temple.
Review: Visiting this temple since 2001 whenever I visit my heart is filled with love,effection and peace.My suggestion visit with ur family and get with all stuff like mutton,chicken ....and have fun.

Name: sravan s
Title: peaceful place
Review: the place is devotional and many people come from long distance here. it is one of the famous temple.. people comes to worship from long distances.

Name: Manidhar
Title: Telangana traditions display
Review: In Sravana masam ( August) and on Friday, there is huge crowd and takes time. you can see that devoteed bring in Bonams or cook food in the temple premises and offer a Naivedya to the deity - Peddamma ( Mother of Mothers/Big Mother

Name: manavpmp8
Title: Excellent temple
Review: Devotees are well taken care in the temple. Diety is very powerful. Staff are very courteous. Temple can waive car parking fee. Provide lights and develop the left out huge area towards car exit gate. Scope for further development exists. Devotional place.

Name: convwp
Title: Attractive architecture
Review: Paddamma temple was famous. Architecture was really great. Temple was well maintained and attractive. Must visit it.

Name: Radkris1981
Title: Famous temple to visit in Hyderabad
Review: Famous temple in Jubilee/Banjara Hills. Peddamma talli is famous and powerful goddess. Visited in June.

Name: Sunil G
Title: Famous and Clean temple in Jubilee hilss
Review: Located in Jubilee Hills,its a famous Hindu goddess temple with clean interiors. Gets crowded during festival times, if you are just a visitor recommended to visit on weekdays.

Name: chandrasekhar g
Title: Famous Devotional temple located at jubliee hills ares
Review: Daily crowd,donations will be available at temple.2 and 4 wheelers pooja's are available.spacious temple with breakfast/lunch centers available.far away from areas like lbnagar/dilshuknagar.special darshans are available.Many devotees will come on bonalu festival.

Name: hmunjam
Title: Peaceful and clean temple
Review: Temple is quite spacious and peaceful. Not very crowded on regular weekends. Neat premises. Ample parking.

Name: Bandi P
Title: The Presiding Deity of Hyderabad
Review: A  temple located in the midst of the city that has a strong connect with the locals. A nice experience for devotees. Enough parking. Though one has to look at the timings as there could breaks for darshan during the after noon . When you are in Hyderabad do find time to seek blessings of Peddamma

Name: ramesh
Title: Very peaceful
Review: The temple is located in very busy city centre and yet you will find very peaceful when you enter the temple.

Name: Trending T
Title: Very peaceful place to visit
Review: I have visited this place for my friend family function.This place gave me immense peace to never forget in my life.

Name: Ganesh N
Title: Peddamma Temple
Review: here is a powerful god peddamma talli very nice place i went to there so many times good temple every body can go there

Name: Meghana P
Title: Serenity of Godess Peddhamma
Review: its a hindu temple located in Jubli hills. Peddamma Means Pedda- Elder  Amma-Mother, 'Mother of Mothers' or "The Supreme Mother.After entering into the temple, there is a place where coins are placed vertically and make a wish.Devotees believe that their wish will be fulfilled if they place the coin vertically

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: Well Maintained and Clean Temple
Review: I was staying at a Hotel OYO Townhouse 005 in Jubilee Hills area and this temple is located right next to the hotel. Not a big fan of visiting temples but had some free time so decided to check out this temple. No cameras and Cell phones are allowed inside so did not take pictures of the temple and all pictures I posted here are taken from my hotel.Firstly this is a very clean and well maintained temple and it is dedicated to goddess Laxmi who is sitting on top of a Lion. Peddamma in telugu means "Big Mother" or "Mother of all Mothers". The temple has a very typical south indian style and it did not take much time for me to check out this place. There is no entrance fee and it was not that crowded when I visited it at 4 p.m.

Name: RohitNadal
Title: Famous
Review: Famous temple of Hyderabad. Once we offered a goat to the Goddess and had a family lunch get together in the premises of the temple.

Name: Joseph_Bee
Title: Nice Place
Review: Temple was very much famous, This temple was there in center of city. This was very cruddy and full rush

Name: deepa v
Title: Very peaceful
Review: The temple us very old and situated in jubliee hills area.It is dedicated to goddess Durga (pedamma).very peaceful.Fridays are generally rushy,else it is fine.It is closed in the afternoon for around 2 hrs.

Name: Devaa
Title: Durga Temple!!!
Review: This temple is located in the heart of Jubilee Hills posh locality. There is a big arch for the entrance to this age old temple dedicated to goddess Durga. It is spread over a big area and ample of parking space is there.

Name: ravi p
Title: Auspicious place
Review: I felt very nice while visiting this another ammavari temple.. A very powerful ammavaru temple..It was Wednesday around 11.30 so there wasn’t much rush so had peaceful darshan and relaxed atmosphere..Try car park in front of temple inside and if it’s full then try further away as in sunny day you have to walk few 100 mts..

Name: gopij2016
Title: Durga Devi temple in a busy Hyderabad area.
Review: Must stop for a great temple experience. Parking is there inside the premises and outside on the feeder road. I was told this is a very old temple renovated by a honorable local politician.Peaceful, serene inspite of the busy traffic. Queue system is there so everyone can get darshan of the goddess in due time.There are couple of other smaller temples closeby within walking distance.

Name: Rahul Mishra
Title: a beautiful temple of godess Durga
Review: this is a big, beautiful architecture, well organized temple. it is a must go place for durga worshipers.

Name: Santosh1959
Title: Nice and organized temple to pray
Review: The temple is very organized for piligrims, right from parking to the regulated Q. If you are not particular about the days avoid weekends when it is very crouded.

Name: TrueCityZen
Title: Spacious and Peaceful
Review: Nice ammavari(mother goddess) temple in the heart of the city with ample parking and nice infra . Make it a must visit place

Name: Sumitkumar_13
Title: Nice temple
Review: Peddamma Temple is quite a big temple with a well maintained premises. Lot of people come here to pray and worship. Nice place to meditate.

Name: SunshineB
Title: Spellbinding ...
Review: Very easy to get neck ache here trying to see the temples which reach up into the sky!     Amazing but one must show respect, normally all shoes and socks must be removed and obviously no revealing clothes.    Long trousers for men and women saves having to borrow wraps to cover up, especially male and female legs - so  dont wear shorts.     There is a lot to see and admire, definitely need a local guide.

Name: Nishita Jindal
Title: Heart And Soul Of Hyderabad
Review: This temple should definitely be on your itenerary as its one of the most iconic temples of Hyderabad. Being a resident of Hyderabad, I have gone there countless times. There is usually crowd during festival time (even during ekadasi there's a hell of a crowd). Best time to go is on Monday and during the afternoon. But to witness the pooja and the maha-darshan, you'll have to go around 8:00am. The prasad they give is pulihora (lemon rice) for around 20-30 rupees. Gents are supposed to wear full pants as shorts are not allowed and ladies should cover themselves appropraitely. Traditional wear works best for this place.

Name: Veer2468
Title: Good!
Review: This is a must visit when you are in Hyderabad. Location of the temple is at the heart of the city. Excellent.

Name: Karthik Dasu
Title: Famous and powerful temple
Review: It is one of the prominent temples in the city, located at right in the heart of city in Jublee Hills.

Name: vinitasaraf2015
Title: Deity of Hyderabad!
Review: This temple is dedicated to Pedamma devi and has strong religious following in Hyderabad. It is visited a lot by locals

Name: TADAKAMADLA A
Title: Powerful Temple
Review: Jubille Hills Peddamma Temple is very famous temple in Hyderabad. The goddess here is Peddamma. The temple is very powerful. Many people believe that all their wishes are fulfilled here.My wish also fulfilled.

Name: ramki09
Title: huge temple
Review: Pedamma temple is a beautiful Devi temple.Devi is very powerful.There are also saraswati,ganpati and Durga temples and Naga devatha temple in the premises

Name: Lalitha G
Title: very good place and nice one to visit
Review: its a great temple to visit and need to visit this with proper dress code and its very powerful goddess. go with full of trust and everything will be good.

Name: Known Traveller
Title: Awesome God - Divine Place
Review: Very Spiritual place, there are a lot of attractions in the temple. Temple is located in the heart of Jubilee Hills

Name: Pulak
Title: Nice Temple!
Review: The Peddamma Temple is dedicate to Durga Swaroop. It is very nicely maintained temple with good maintenance.

Name: dchakri87
Title: Most popular religious shrine
Review: Peddamma Temple is the most popular religious shrines in Hyderabad situated on Road No.55 of Jubilee Hills.The temple timings are from 6.00a.m. to 1.00p.m. and again from 3.00p.m. to 8.00p.m. It is easily accessible by Bus, auto, cab etc.There is free darshan as well as special darshan by entry fee.Lot of parking space is there which is a paid one.  Peddamma Temple is dedicated to Goddess Laxmi, the name is derived from two words Pedda and Amma which means Mother of Mothers denoting the Goddess.This temple is famous for various festivals during which devotees from all over the state visit and seek blessings. Bonalu festival which is famous in Telangana is celebrated with great fervour and pomp.   This temple is 150yrs old and is an important landmark of Hyderabad.

Name: SureshReddyS
Title: Very well maintained temple
Review: Very spacious and peaceful temple. Has been here multiple time, always felt peaceful and good. There are other temples as well in the premises.

Name: Neerajbans
Title: A peaceful heaven in the midst of bustling city
Review: A temple with big land area and also amazingly clean & well maintained. The main lord is in the middle of the temple and it does get crowded in the morning & evening. Also you can arrange for a special pooja if you wish to. Ample parking space is provided and recommend to leave your footwear in the car.

Name: Shri Krishan Kansal
Title: Jai Mata Ki
Review: A Ma Durga Swarup Temple located in Jubilee Hills is very well maintained neat and clean. People of the city and area have faith in Ma Durga. On Saturdays and Sundays there is huge rush of devotees.

Name: ravi p
Title: Auspicious place
Review: Being in Hyderabad since birth I only went to this temple now and I felt why I didn’t come all This time.. a must visit place to get peddamma thalli blessing.. has good parking place and well managed even though it was busy..

Name: Sailakshmy S
Title: Beautiful Temple
Review: This goddess temple was built to recognize her as the deity of Hyderabad.  It's a very colorful temple with exquisite wall art.  Avoid going here on weekends.

Name: Veer2468
Title: Peaceful
Review: This is located in the middle of the city- jubilee hills area. very peaceful temple. Even though it is crowded but nicely managed by management.

Name: naiduks24
Title: Great temple
Review: Located in Road Number 4 Jubilee Hills, Goddess Pedamma is the Prime Goddess in this temple, we visited early hours no rush, peaceful visit.

Name: harelbr
Title: Beautiful
Review: Went there on a Sunday morning while on a business trip to Hyderabad. Even though the place was packed with people, the atmosphere was wonderful, and it was super interesting to see rituals (to which I was new), the beautiful temple, and meet the friendly people. There are a couple of shops just outside the temple where you can buy souvenirs.

Name: Ideaboy
Title: Nice place
Review: You will enjoy the place when you come without any work (most of the devotees come with some poojas).
